title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather comprehensive requirements for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system, including but not limited to: types of conflicts it should address (workplace harassment, communication breakdown, conflict of interests), target users (employees at all levels, human resource personnel), desired outcomes (resolution suggestions, mediation techniques, communication strategies). Define the project scope and create a high-level system architecture. Include edge cases, error handling mechanisms, performance optimizations, scalability considerations, accessibility features, and security measures. Prepare documentation for each requirement and its associated use case for future reference. Also, consider the cultural sensitivity of the suggestions provided by the system and ensure that they are appropriate across various geographical regions. Update the task type to 'enhancement' as this task is not just about creating new functionalities but also improving existing ones.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system, including the input methods for describing conflicts, the presentation of guidance and recommendations, and the overall user experience.

title: Develop Conflict Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core AI engine that analyzes the input conflict scenarios and generates appropriate guidance and recommendations for resolution.

title: Implement Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Design and implement the data storage and retrieval system for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor, including storing conflict scenarios, recommendations, and user feedback.

title: Develop User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access to the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system and protect user data.
